title: Support Your Local Sheriff (1969) 720p DVDRemastered.mkv
description:
I took an original DVD. I then used an avisynth script to reduce the frame-rate from 29.97 fps back to the original 23.976 fps. The same script was used to do some cleaning of the video to improve the quality. I then ran it through the Super Resolution VirtualDub plugin Infognition.com. I also used Subtitle Edit to OCR the Spanish and French subtitles from the original DVD since I could not find replacements at the various subtitle websites. The English and Spanish audio were left untouched.

I've seen the HDTV upload on here and still felt this was a higher quality version. If others disagree, I won't try to use Super Resolution on any more movies because it took me about 3 days to process this video at this high quality.
